abstract.t: This document describes an extention on AODV [1] so that clustering of MANET nodes can be allowed for the improvement of MANET scalability. MANET clustering requires some MANET nodes to become Cluster Heads (CHs) and each non-CH MANET nodes to belong to any one appropriate cluster which is represented by a CH node.In this draft, AODV control messages are extended for MANET clustering.
